title: 5.3 Master Challenge 3
question: A hi-tech company develops a new mobile app. Mr.Fred, who is a person with a disability, sues the company for accessibility issues. Analyze the issue and suggest the law under which this case will be registered. What preventive measures should be taken by the company to avoid such scenarios?
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
